title: Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster - 3 Packs 30 Feet Each Pre-Baited, Ready to Use Indoors & Outdoors. Bug Insect Infestation Sticky Adhesive Scented Green Color Barn Paper Sheet Disposable Non-Toxic
descriptions:
Introducing the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster - your ultimate solution for pest management! This product comes in a pack of 3, with each pack containing 30 feet of sticky adhesive barn paper sheet.

Pre-baited and ready to use straight out of the pack, this green-colored, disposable, and non-toxic trap is perfect for both indoor and outdoor use. Its scented formula attracts insects effectively, making it ideal for residential, commercial, industrial, barn, waste room, and animal farm applications.

The Giant Fly Glue Trap is designed to withstand various conditions, including normal, damp, and humid areas, providing you with a reliable and long-lasting solution. Its intelligent pest management approach ensures that your space remains pest-free for up to a full year, with each pack covering an impressive 3600 square inches.

Please note that this product should not be used in areas where rodenticides or snap traps are undesirable. Experience the power of intelligent pest management with the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster!
